Photo / Gary Hamilton-Irvine

Another Golden Boot to ace Gisborne Thistle striker Somerton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/10/another-golden-boot-to-ace-gisborne-thistle-striker-somerton/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/10/another-golden-boot-to-ace-gisborne-thistle-striker-somerton/ John GilliesSomerton's fourth hat-trick of the season helped his Jags win 5-2. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Electrinet Gisborne Thistle striker Jimmy Somerton lets fly at goal in Saturday's Central Fed League game against Havelock North Wanderers at Childers Rd Reserve. Somerton missed on this occasion but found the back of the net three times as he clinched another Golden Boot honour as the league's top goalscorer. Photo / Paul Rickard

Ngāti Porou proposes Tairāwhiti Recovery Authority for roading https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/10/ngati-porou-proposes-tairawhiti-recovery-authority-for-roading/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/09/10/ngati-porou-proposes-tairawhiti-recovery-authority-for-roading/ Wynsley WrigleyTimutimu calls for urgent investment in Tairāwhiti’s roading infrastructure, environment. Mon, 09 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Vehicles head along the SH35 bypass on Pourau Road near Tolaga Bay after its official opening last year. Te Rūnanganui o Ngāti Porou is proposing a regional recovery authority with joint governance between the Crown, Gisborne District Council and iwi/hapū which would be responsible for maintenance, recovery and resilience work on the district's state highways and local roads. Photo / Liam Clayton
